verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> unto <S%H3427>me<s%>, and sat before <S%H6440>me<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, these <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H5927>taken<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> into their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> their <S%H6440>face<s%>: should I be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of at all by <S%H1875>them<s%>?

Therefore <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, and say unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Every <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H5927>taketh<s%> his <S%H1544>idols<s%> into his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H7760>putteth<s%> the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H935>cometh<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>; I <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him <S%H935>therein<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1544>idols<s%>;
that I may <S%H8610>take<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>, because they are all <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from me through their <S%H1544>idols<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H7725>Return<s%> <S%H7725>ye<s%>, and turn yourselves from your <S%H1544>idols<s%>; and turn <S%H7725>away<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> from all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

For every <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H5144>separateth<s%> himself from <S%H310>me<s%>, and <S%H5927>taketh<s%> his <S%H1544>idols<s%> into his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H7760>putteth<s%> the <S%H4383>stumblingblock<s%> of his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H935>cometh<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> for himself of <S%H3068>me<s%>; I Jehovah will answer him by <S%H6030>myself<s%>:

and I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%>, and will <S%H8074>make<s%> him an <S%H226>astonishment<s%>, for a sign and a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, and I will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And if the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H6601>deceived<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%>, <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H6601>deceived<s%> that <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H8045>him<s%>, and will destroy him from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall be even as the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of him that seeketh unto <S%H1875>him<s%>;

that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may go no more <S%H8582>astray<s%> from <S%H310>me<s%>, neither <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves any more with all their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>; but that they may be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I may be their <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, when a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> against me by <S%H4604>committing<s%> a <S%H4603>trespass<s%>, and I stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H7665>it<s%>, and break the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7971>thereof<s%>, and send <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon <S%H3772>it<s%>, and cut off from it <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>;

though these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, and <S%H347>Job<s%>, were in <S%H8432>it<s%>, they should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> but their own <S%H5315>souls<s%> by their <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

If <S%H3863><s%> I cause <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and they <S%H7921>ravage<s%> <S%H8077>it<s%>, and it be made desolate, so that no man may pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2416>beasts<s%>;

though these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> were in <S%H8432>it<s%>, as I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, they should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> neither <S%H1121>sons<s%> nor <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; they only should be <S%H5337>delivered<s%>, but the <S%H776>land<s%> should be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>.

Or if I <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon that <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H2719>Sword<s%>, go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; so that I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from it <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>;

though these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> were in <S%H8432>it<s%>, as I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, they should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> neither <S%H1121>sons<s%> nor <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, but they only should be delivered <S%H5337>themselves<s%>.

Or if I <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> into that <S%H776>land<s%>, and pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon it in <S%H1818>blood<s%>, to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from it <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>;

though <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, and <S%H347>Job<s%>, were in <S%H8432>it<s%>, as I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, they should <S%H5337>deliver<s%> neither <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>; they should but <S%H5337>deliver<s%> their own <S%H5315>souls<s%> by their <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: How much more when I <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%>, and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from it <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>!

Yet <S%H3498><s%>, behold, therein shall be left a <S%H6413>remnant<s%> that shall be carried <S%H3318>forth<s%>, both <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: <S%H3318>behold<s%>, they shall come forth unto <S%H7200>you<s%>, and ye shall see their <S%H1870>way<s%> and their <S%H5949>doings<s%>; and ye shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> concerning the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H935>brought<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, even concerning all that I have brought upon <S%H935>it<s%>.

And they shall <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H7200>you<s%>, when ye see their <S%H1870>way<s%> and their <S%H5949>doings<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have not <S%H6213>done<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%> all that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H5002>it<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
